alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 30 at 1:32PM PST until February 02 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Periods of heavy snow and gusty winds possible. 3 to 6 inches possible 6000-7000 feet, 6-18 inches possible 7000-8000 feet, 18-24 inches possible at 8000 feet. 1-3 inches possible 4500-6000 feet.Southerly winds gusting 40 to 50 mph Thursday becoming westerly with gusts to 50 mph possible late Thursday into Friday. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels on Thursday will be 6500-7000 ft before steadily falling to 4500 feet early Friday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
